title: Fylde Borough Council: £155 Million Over Eleven Years of Data
summary: The longest dataset on the platform — 37,514 transactions since 2015. Fylde's 16.9x year-end spending spike is the second highest in Lancashire, with 10 threshold suspects and 4 monopoly categories flagging procurement risks.
